content.prompt: In studies of stages of development, why is it important to include participants that represent a diverse range of cultural backgrounds?

choices.label: This will make it more likely that the results will be statistically significant.
Culture can influence when and how individuals experience developmental changes in their lives.
Including more diverse participants will make it easier to randomly assign subjects to groups.
Including more diverse participants makes it possible to use double-blind procedures.

topic.text: 3.1: Themes and Methods in Developmental Psychology
